name: European Women Alliance
goal:
Advocating for women's rights and gender equality. Supporting and organizing initiatives and campaigns aiming at reinforcing gender equality at European and national level.
Promoting European values in education and culture.
interests: Borders and Security, Climate Action, Culture, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, European Neighbourhood Policy, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Research and innovation, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
Digital Single market;
Innovation policy;
Social Pillar;
Migration policy;
Gender policy;
Single market;
Human Rights;
Multiannual Financial Framework.
